Assignement 2  for the course 18641:

In this assignment, three cases are tested, that is students' number is less than 40, equals to 40 and bigger than 40.
Here is the test result:

1: Number less than 40 (10 students are tested)
Here is the result:

Stud	Qu1	Qu2	Qu3	Qu4	Qu5
1234	34	54	53	100	98	
2134	43	24	45	74	87	
4532	54	77	37	87	74

Highest	76	87	95	100	98	
Average	61.1	61.9	63.5	72.0	75.8

3: Number more than 40 (41 students are tested, but only the first 40 students are involved)

We only store the first 40 students' grades and calculate their data !
